description: I. Draft of letter dated August 2007 from Kennedy Humphreys, Security Policy Division, Cabinet Office, to HR Directors and Departmental Security Officers regarding the message from the Security Industry Authority about right to work checks in the UK. Incl. copy of message from the SIA to security customers with sensitive sites. 3 p. II. Dear colleague letter dated 13th August 2007 from Andrew Drane, Acting Chief Executive, SIA, regarding the security employers' responsibilities and the changes in the documents that licence applicants need to provide. 5 p.
